description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Welcome to Dyad!  Dyad’s ten challenging single player puzzles and platforming levels force you to use two characters at once.  Up to four players can battle to see who lasts the longest while avoiding obstacles and the competition in exciting multiplayer action.
description.short: Welcome to Dyad!  Dyad’s ten challenging single player puzzles and platforming levels force you to use two characters at once.  Up to four players can battle to see who lasts the longest while avoiding obstacles and the competition in exciting multiplayer action.
